original_text: Make sure that there is justice for everyone in the land that the Lord your God is giving to you. Then the land will belong to you and you will enjoy life in it. Do not worship other gods Make sure that there is justice for everyone in the land that the Lord your God is giving to you. Then the land will belong to you and you will enjoy life in it.
korean_text: 너는 마땅히 공의만을 따르라 그리하면 네가 살겠고 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅을 차지하리라

sentences.original_text: Make sure that there is justice for everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 모두를 위한 정의가 있도록 확실하게 하라

sentences.original_text: in the land that the Lord your God is giving to you
Then the land will belong to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 땅이 너의 것이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: and you will enjoy life in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그곳에서 삶을 즐길 것이다
